resources.string: Ancient Greece payout every sunday at 01:00 Paris time. Has a cheap price but also the worst returns.
Crystal Palace payout every sunday at 01:00 Paris time. This is at the moment the one we recommend you to buy.
Arkadia Moon payout every day at 01:00. This stock is atm kinda over priced.
Arkadia Underground every day at 01:00. Most expensive stock we have, but payout good.
